overview: It looks like an average pool in the back of a typical suburban home, but what happens when once touches the water, has got the whole neighborhood in an uproar. Magically, and erotically, this pole has the power to alter one’s sexual desires and lusts. Come let Megan Leigh and her friends get you wet in the ‘MAGIC POOL.’ Dive right in with a deliciously decadent cast of erotica's finest!
title: Magic Pool
